content: Here are upcoming webcasts on Analytics, Big Data, Data Science and Data Mining for Aug 19 and later.  See full schedule at www.kdnuggets.com/webcasts/index.html . When Event Aug 19 8 am PT 11 am ET DATA MINING : FAILURE TO LAUNCH - How to Get Predictive Modeling Off the Ground and Into Orbit , by The Modeling Agency. Aug 19 8 am PT 11 am ET  Preparing for Smart Metering Success - an Internet of Things Case Study, featuring Itron , by HP Vertica. Aug 19 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Marketing Analytics for Today's Marketers , by Actuate. Aug 19 1 pm PT 4 pm ET  Enterprise Hadoop is Here to Stay: Plan Your Evolution Strategy , The Bloor Group Briefing Room with Neil Raden and Teradata. Aug 20 10 am PT 1 pm ET (120 mins)  Data Science at the Command Line , by Jeroen Janssens, using Data Science Toolbox, a free, open-source virtual environment. Aug 20 1 pm PT 4 pm ET  A Tighter Weave - How YARN Changes the Data Quality Game , The Bloor Group Hot Technologies with David Loshin, David Raab and RedPoint Global. Aug 21 7 am PT 10 am ET  Accelerating Your Data with IBM Cognos Dynamic Cubes , by IBM. Aug 21 11 am PT 2 pm ET  Interactive Search and Visualization , by Sqrrl and Splunk. Aug 21 11 am PT 2 pm ET  Data Analytics on a Budget , by High Water Advisors. Aug 26 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Changing Your Enterprise Data Unification and Analysis , By Zoomdata and Tamr. Aug 26 11 am PT 2 pm ET  How Big Companies are Approaching Big Data to Deliver Big Results , by Mike Gualtieri (Forrester) and Neeraj Kumar (Cardinal Health). Aug 27 8 am PT 11 am ET  Enabling Personalized Healthcare with Biomedical Informatics , by Chris Roche, Chief Commercial Officer, Aridhia and Pivotal. Aug 27 9 am PT noon ET  Getting Started with the Lavastorm Analytics Engine , By Lavastorm. Aug 27 2 pm PT 5 pm ET  Discover your next big business opportunity with brilliant mapping , by Yellowfin (also repeated on Aug 28, 29 at other times convenient for Asia and Europe). Aug 28 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Discover Just How Easy Data Integration Can Be , By Talend. Sep 9 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Introduction to Modern Regression Analysis Techniques (part 1) , Linear, Logistic, Nonlinear, Regularized, GPS, LARS, LASSO, Elastic Net, and MARS, by Salford Systems. Sep 16 10 am PT 1 pm ET  Introduction to Modern Regression Analysis Techniques (part 2) , Linear, Logistic, Nonlinear, Regularized, GPS, LARS, LASSO, Elastic Net, and MARS, by Salford Systems.

Upcoming Webcasts on Analytics, Big Data, Data Science – Aug 19 and beyond

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Data Mining, Data Science, Hadoop, Healthcare, Regression

Data Mining: Failure To Launch, Smart Metering, Hadoop, Data Science at the Command Line, Personalized Healthcare, Modern Regression Analysis Techniques, and more.


Here are upcoming webcasts on Analytics, Big Data, Data Science and Data Mining for Aug 19 and later.

See full schedule at www.kdnuggets.com/webcasts/index.html .
